CustomField.description: The account to ship the related line items to. Used to calculate tax. If blank, the Bill To fields will be used for tax calculations. For non-tangible goods, such as services or software, this is the address where the products will be 'used'.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The account to ship the related line items to. Used to calculate tax. If blank, the Bill To fields will be used for tax calculations. For non-tangible goods, such as services or software, this is the address where the products will be 'used'.
CustomField.label: Account (Ship To)
